titleInfo.title: USA v. Jones
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting 18 Motion to Withdraw as Attorney as to Allen M. Jones (1). Assistant Federal Public Defender John C. Vanderslice and the Federal Public Defenders office shall be permitted to withdraw as counsel of record for Mr. Jones. The Federal Public Defender's office shall contact a CJA panel attorney to represent Mr. Jones in the above captioned matter. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. (E-mailed to Karen Burks)(JAB)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Jones
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER granting 29 Defendant's Oral Motion to continue regarding MOTION to Suppress 24 as to Allen M. Jones (1). Suppression Hearing continued to 6/20/2012 at 09:30 AM in Courtroom 2, Robert V. Denney Federal Building, 100 Centennial Mall North, Lincoln, NE before Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. The time between today's date and the anticipated hearing, shall be deemed excluded in any computation of time under the requirements of the Speedy Trial Act. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. (JAB)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Jones
titleInfo.subTitle: FINDINGS, RECOMMENDATION, AND ORDER to the Honorable John M. Gerrard that the motion to suppress, filing 24, be denied in all respects as to defendant Allen M. Jones.1) The clerk shall cause an expedited transcript of the hearing to be prepared and filed.2) Counsel are given fourteen days from the date the transcript is available to counsel for reading in the clerk's office in which to file objections to this recommendation.3) Trial of this matter is set to commence at 9:00 a.m., October 2, 2012, before the Honorable John M. Gerrard, United States District Judge in Courtroom No. 1, United States Courthouse and Federal Building, 100 Centennial Mall North, Lincoln, Nebraska. Jury selection will be held at commencement of trial. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. (JAB)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska

Gerrard, United States District Judge in Courtroom No. 1, United States Courthouse and Federal Building, 100 Centennial Mall North, Lincoln, Nebraska. Jury selection will be held at commencement of trial. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. (JAB)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Jones
titleInfo.subTitle: FINDINGS AND RECOMMENDATION to the Honorable John M. Gerrard, United States District Judge, pursuant to 28 U.S.C. § 636(b), that the defendant's motion to suppress, (filing no. 24), be denied in its entirety as to defendant Allen M. Jones. The parties are notified that failing to file an objection to this recommendation as provided in the local rules of this court may be held to be a waiver of any right to appeal the court's adoption of the recommendation. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. (JAB)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska

Gerrard, United States District Judge, pursuant to 28 U.S.C. § 636(b), that the defendant's motion to suppress, (filing no. 24), be denied in its entirety as to defendant Allen M. Jones. The parties are notified that failing to file an objection to this recommendation as provided in the local rules of this court may be held to be a waiver of any right to appeal the court's adoption of the recommendation. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. (JAB)
